item.title: Newsite
item.description: Create a portfolio site (minimum expenditure & work) I created my portfolio site with Hugo, again! This time, with a plan and adequate free time, I was able to get it to a publishable version 1.0. There is almost no front-end development involved and zero back-end work too(I did work on the backend engine of verless, another static site generator, so not technically zero xD). I will document the process soon, but here are the main steps:
